items.name: daylight
items.description: play before selection phase no bite turned or mist form this round

items.name: hallowed ground
items.description: players must discard a face down card keeping it face down. Not a turned card

items.name: cured
items.description: discard turned og vampire role card face up keep face up

items.name: wound
items.description: take a wound

items.name: bite
items.description: take a bite, players that have been bitten are vulnerable to being turned

items.name: bait
items.description: PLAY AFTER SELECTION PHASE ALL VAMPIRES must play a bite on you

items.name: garlic
items.description: prevent a bite played on you this term

items.name: mist form
items.description: prevent a stake placed on you

items.name: confession
items.description: discard after selection phase to make a player play their cards face up

items.name: vervain
items.description: prevent a mind control or a bite played on you or play this card after the play phase to prevent all bites or force discard all mind controls in play

items.name: cursed
items.description: you cannot be healed while you have this card can be removed with vervain

items.name: mob
items.description: PLAY AFTER SELECTION PHASE ALL PLAYER MUST DISCARD ALL BUT ONE CARD FROM THEIR HAND

items.name: terror
items.description: you cannot use defense cards this round

items.name: suspicion
items.description: If you ever have three suspicion cards discard all three and flip any one of your face down cards face up this includes your role card.

items.name: turned
items.description: If you had a bite token before this round you are not a vampire

items.name: mind control
items.description: You must pick and play a bite or wound on every round if possible. This card can be removed with vervain

items.name: cross
items.description: prevent a bite played on you discard after use

items.name: revolver
items.description: you must pick one player to wound

items.name: peace
items.description: all players remove one wound or bite token

items.name: torch
items.description: you must discard a face down card keeping it face down it cannot be a turned card

items.name: dodge
items.description: prevent a wound played on you this turn

items.name: stake
items.description: Take one wound token. if you are a vampire with at least 3 wounds you die

items.name: crossbow
items.description: you must pick one player to stake

items.name: crossbow
items.description: you must pick one player to stake

items.name: bible
items.description: prevent a bit or wound played on you discard after use

items.name: grave robber
items.description: take and play and card from the discard

items.name: holy water
items.description: if you are a vampire you must reveal your turned card or your role card

items.name: feed
items.description: discard anytime to give one of your wound tokens to another player. this card cannot kill a player

items.name: padding
items.description: prevent a wound token played on you discard after use

items.name: heal
items.description: remove a bible or wound token
